source:
def exmp (c,w,s):
    relw=w/12
    wqi= relw*(c/s)*100
    return wqi
x=exmp (df.pH,1,8.5)
df['sub_index_pH']=x

def exmp (c,w,s):
    relw=w/12
    wqi= relw*(c/s)*100
    return wqi
x=exmp (df.COD,5,10)
df['sub_index_COD']=x

def exmp (c,w,s):
    relw=w/12
    wqi= relw*(c/s)*100
    return wqi
x=exmp (df.BOD,2,3)
df['sub_index_BOD']=x

    wqi= relw*(c/s)*100
